text: Channapatna Ramaswami Simha () better known as C. R. Simha () (June 16, 1942 â€“ February 28, 2014) was an Indian actor, director, dramatist and a playwright. He was best known for his work on Kannada movies and for his work in stage shows. He directed many successful stage shows such as Kakanakote, Thughlaq and Sankranthi.
